gui.sharedMessages.backdrop.description: Default name for a new backdrop, scratch will automatically adjust the number if necessary

gui.sharedMessages.costume.description: Default name for a new costume, scratch will automatically adjust the number if necessary

gui.sharedMessages.sprite.description: Default name for a new sprite, scratch will automatically adjust the number if necessary

gui.sharedMessages.pop.description: Name of the pop sound, the default sound added to a sprite
